title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items (including the pulldown menu icon and the close icon) move below the label. This behavior was observed on Linux, running build 20011127 (not on build 20011116 on Nt2000). Users might get confused if these icons start moving around.
OB: On Linux, running build 20011127, when resizing the Navigator view smaller, the close button and the pulldown menu icon move below the label.
EB: The close button and the pulldown menu icon should stay on the same line as the label regardless of how small the view is.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe that the close button and the pulldown menu icon move below the label.
